pages.text: Oh, so you're an Advancement Hunter with style!$(br2)With Paginated Advancements installed, you will find that Spectrum's advancements use new, unique frames.

pages.title: Milestones
pages.text: Marks the start and end of an advancement tree: major milestones in your journey.

pages.title: Additional Unlocks
pages.text: Advancements using this slightly altered frame have some kind of unlock attached to them: new recipes, a new revelation or something else. (for all you completionists out there!)$(br2)The default frame is used for advancements without additional unlocks.

pages.title: Structure Building
pages.text: Advancements using this frame show you that you have a new structure to build.

pages.title: Unique Advancements
pages.text: For affairs of heart, which require an extraordinary eye to detail.

pages.title: Shitpost Advancements
pages.text: Granted when doing something remarkably stupid.$(br)These are purely optional meme advancements without any unlocks.
